ca.cgjennings.ui.text

Class AbstractTokenHighlightPainter

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.text.LayeredHighlighter.LayerPainter
      • javax.swing.text.DefaultHighlighter.DefaultHighlightPainter
        • ca.cgjennings.ui.text.AbstractTokenHighlightPainter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Highlighter.HighlightPainter
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ErrorSquigglePainter, UnderlinePainter

    public abstract class AbstractTokenHighlightPainter
extends DefaultHighlighter.DefaultHighlightPainter
    A base class for token painters that implements the logic needed to disable painting when the cursor is inside a token.
    Since:
    3.0

    • Method Detail

      • isTokenHidden

        protected final boolean isTokenHidden(JTextComponent tc,
                                      int off0,
                                      int off1)
        Subclasses should call this in paintLayer, and if it returns true should return without painting anything.
        Parameters:
        tc - the text component
        off0 - the start offset of the layer
        off1 - the end offset of the layer
        Returns:
        true if the layer should be painted

      • isTokenUnderCursorPainted

        public final boolean isTokenUnderCursorPainted()
